comment.author: 61614891@N06
comment._content: Believe it or not, at this time Capital and one other small commuter airline (Allen Aviation?) offered almost hourly service to Kansas City International from Topeka.   This one is about to fly to KC.

comment.author: 39827348@N05
comment._content: I believe it!! I collected OAGs and I am fascinated with all commuter airline operations!!
